title: SNL’s Bowen Yang, Chloe Fineman Answer Fan Questions: WATCH
text:
Saturday Night Live has this week off — it’ll be back in action with Chance the Rapper next week — but in the meantime, the show released a very fun video today that gives fans the chance to know newbie cast members Bowen Yang and Chloe Fineman a little better. Yang and Fineman field a bunch of questions from fans, including which characters from the show’s past they wish they could play (we would love to see a Mango reboot fronted by Yang, for the record), their favorite sketches (lots of love for Natalie Portman’s rap), plus some excellent advice Yang got from supervising writer Anna Drezen: “Stop wringing your hands about writing. Just do it. Stop planning. Just go out there, do it. If it sucks, it’s gonna suck. It’s gonna suck no matter what. Just do it.” Most importantly, Yang and Fineman reveal their zodiac signs — Fineman is a “weeping Cancer,” and Yang is a “dripping Scorpio.” And in case that didn’t make it clear who this video is for, Yang says it explicitly: “If you’re a Cancer, a Pisces, or a Scorpio — if you’re a water sign, please reach out. If you’re any of the other ones, do not come near us. Go away!”

Related
description: “Saturday Night Live” released a video today featuring new cast members Bowen Yang and Chloe Fineman, who field a bunch of questions from fans.
